title: Reconnect Isues
body: The game is already finished but I still got there the recconect button Iam on EUNE and my acc name is -snip- I gues that there is nothing that I can fix here only just by an riot supporter {{champion:1}} {{champion:268}}

replies.body: I edited out your account name for privacy reasons.  It sounds like you had a ghost game issue, meaning that the match failed to communicate it ended to our game servers.  Sometimes it can take up to an hour for it to refresh, but relogging can force it as well.  Hopefully, everything is okay now!
